points: Centralized operations control: Single dashboard to monitor refills, preventive maintenance, fire extinguisher expirations, and current certifications.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Meet our team
aboutUs.description: We are a passionate team of developers and designers committed to creating innovative technological solutions that transform businesses and improve lives.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2024, Runa Code was born with the vision of creating high-quality software that combines technological innovation with a deep understanding of business needs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to provide exceptional technological solutions that drive the growth and success of our clients, through a collaborative, agile and results-oriented approach.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and approaches to deliver the best possible solutions.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We are committed to excellence in every line of code we write and every project we deliver.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: We believe in the power of collaboration and combining our diverse skills to achieve exceptional results.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and that passion is reflected in every project we undertake.

member1.bio: Frontend specialist focused on intuitive UI design and user experience. Also brings solid backend knowledge to deliver full-stack solutions.

member2.bio: Backend developer with strong experience in API design, database management, and distributed systems. Also skilled in frontend development to provide end-to-end solutions.

member3.bio: Versatile developer with a focus on innovation, experienced in crafting modern interfaces with a keen eye for user experience. Combines backend knowledge and a passion for exploring new technologies to stay ahead of the curve.
